SEARCH
Package me.squidxtv.frameui.api

Interface ScreenRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScreenRegistryImpl
public interface ScreenRegistry
The ScreenRegistry interface is used to manage Screen instances across the entire server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(Screen screen)
    Adds a Screen to the registry.
    List<Screen>
    getAll()
    Returns a list of all screens in the registry.
    List<Screen>
    getByPlugin(Plugin plugin)
    Returns a list of screens associated with a specific plugin.
    List<Screen>
    getByViewer(UUID uuid)
    Returns a list of screens that contain the specific uuid of a viewer.
    List<Screen>
    getByViewer(Player viewer)
    Returns a list of screens that contain the specific player as a viewer.
    void
    remove(Screen screen)
    Removes a Screen from the registry.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(Screen screen)
      Adds a Screen to the registry.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to add to the registry

    • remove

      void remove(Screen screen)
      Removes a Screen from the registry.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen to remove from the registry

    • getAll

      List<Screen> getAll()
      Returns a list of all screens in the registry.
      Returns:
      a list of all screens

    • getByPlugin

      List<Screen> getByPlugin(Plugin plugin)
      Returns a list of screens associated with a specific plugin.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin to filter registered screens by
      Returns:
      a list of screens associated with the given plugin

    • getByViewer

      List<Screen> getByViewer(Player viewer)
      Returns a list of screens that contain the specific player as a viewer.
      Parameters:
      viewer - the viewer to filter registered screens by
      Returns:
      a list of screens that contain the given viewer

    • getByViewer

      List<Screen> getByViewer(UUID uuid)
      Returns a list of screens that contain the specific uuid of a viewer.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the uuid to filter registered screens by
      Returns:
      a list of screens that contain the given uuid of a viewer
